title: Ep 495 The Latest Liberal Smear Campaign Exposed
description:
In this episode I address the latest liberal smear-campaign against the NRA and Dana Loesch and the tactics they are using to distract you from their violent movement.  http://legalinsurrection.com/2017/07/smear-campaign-against-dana-loesch-over-nra-video/?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+LegalInsurrection+%28Le%C2%B7gal+In%C2%B7sur%C2%B7rec%C2%B7tion%29     I also discuss the possible Republican capitulation on a major Obamacare tax hike and how liberals are misleading you about its effects. https://www.wsj.com/articles/the-senates-tax-panic-1499030315   http://www.heritage.org/taxes/report/tax-cuts-not-the-clinton-tax-hike-produced-the-1990s-boom   Finally, I address a few lifestyle stories about diet and stem cell treatments.  https://www.t-nation.com/diet-fat-loss/coconut-oil-health-food-or-heart-killer?utm_source=facebook&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=article6000   http://nationalpost.com/news/canada/canadian-clinics-begin-offering-stem-cell-treatments-experts-call-unproven-possibly-unsafe/wcm/f73a696e-a34f-4f4f-9d92-ca8a26707a03   
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
